# eraseProgressPanelWillBegin(_:)

**Instance Method**

Notification sent by the panel before display.

## Declaration

```swift
func eraseProgressPanelWillBegin(_ aNotification: Notification!)
```

## Parameters

- **aNotification**: Always `DREraseProgressPanelWillBeginNotification` You can retrieve the `DREraseProgressPanel` object in question by sending [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/object] to `aNotification`.

## Discussion

If the delegate implements this method it will receive the message immediately before the panel is displayed.
